overview: In a Hawaiian tourist shop, a tiki toy is in love with a hula girl bobble toy. However, what happens when he has to compete with an arrogant flame dancer? Worst of all, a customer whisks them both away, leaving the tiki behind! Will the tiki toy be able to reach them in time?
tagline: CGI 3D Animated Short Film: Tiki Time Animated Short Film by Mia Pray and Tessa Pray.
title: Tiki Time
